questions: {"user_parameter": "None", "q_text": "Hi, so, I'm gonna ask you a couple of questions for my set up. It'll only take a few minutes. Is it ok if I do that?", "audio_f": "./audio/setup qs/Audio 1.m4a", "id": "3906cc9a-ac55-11ec-b826-a483e702f53d"}
{"user_parameter": "nickname", "q_text": "What would you like me to call you?", "audio_f": "./audio/setup qs/Audio 3.m4a", "id": "3906d1b8-ac55-11ec-b826-a483e702f53d"}
{"user_parameter": "eyes' color", "q_text": "What is the color of your eyes?", "audio_f": "./audio/setup qs/Audio 6.m4a", "id": "d48ae116-ac54-11ec-9e60-a483e702f53d"}
{"user_parameter": "self-esteem", "q_text": "On a scale of one to ten, what do you think you are?", "audio_f": "./audio/setup qs/Self Esteem.m4a", "id": "34edddcc-ac6b-11ec-93cf-a483e702f53d"}

finish_setup.text: Ok, that's it for now. If you ever wanna talk to me, just say: "Hey, Kevin"
And I'll be happy to help
